name: generate-package-json-webpack-plugin
description: Generates a package.json file containing the external modules used by your webpack bundle

scripts.cut-patch-release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.cut-minor-release: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.cut-major-release: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Paul Myburgh
